vote.title: Authorize a five-year cooperative purchasing agreement for a Mass Emergency Notification System for the Office of Emergency Management and Crisis Response with AT&T Enterprises, LLC through the Texas Department of Information Resources cooperative agreement - Not to exceed $984,786.00 - Financing: CSEC Prop 8 Next Generation 9-1-1 Service Fund
